83078.summary: Some customers in the Red River area of Thunder Bay are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
83078.title: Sept 16 - Thunder Bay (Red River) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
